resources.string: Open this service to enable three key earphone change music by press up or down key.\nYou need also give the root permission!
Please Set These Before You Use!
Click the button on your earphone which means volume UP.
Click the button on your earphone which means volume DOWN.
You may click a wrong button.\nCurrent Key:
You must root your device before you use it!
1.When you close the screen, the physical key which control volume will change music instead.\n\n2.We will not change any files in System after being given ROOT Permission.
